    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Elementos de la comunicación y funciones del lenguaje</string>
            <string language="en">The elements of communication and functions of languages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Elemente der Kommunikation und Funktionen von
Sprachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les éléments de transmission et fonctions des 
langages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os elementos de uma comunicação e funções das
línguas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli elementi della comunicazione e funzioni dei 
linguaggi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα στοιχεία της επικοινωνίας και λειτουργίες των 
γλωσσών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Determinar la relación existente entre los elementos que participan en un acto comunicativo y las funciones del lenguaje.</string>
            <string language="en">Determination of the existing relation among the elements that are present in an act of communication and the functions of languages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Comunicación</string>
            <string language="en">Communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Funciones del lenguaje</string>
            <string language="en">Language functions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ermittlung der vorhandenen Relation unter den 
Elementen, die in einer Tat der Kommunikation und in den Funktionen 
von Sprachen anwesend sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination de la relation existante parmi les
éléments qui sont présents dans un acte de transmission et les 
fonctions des langages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinação da relação existente entre os 
elementos que estão atuais em um ato de uma comunicação e nas 
funções das línguas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione del rapporto attuale fra gli 
elementi che sono presenti in un atto della comunicazione e nelle 
funzioni dei linguaggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσδιορισμός της υπάρχουσας σχέσης μεταξύ των 
στοιχείων που είναι παρόντα σε μια πράξη της επικοινωνίας και τις
λειτουργίες των γλωσσών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachfunktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions-langues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma comunicação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções de língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comunicazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni di linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλωσσικές λειτουργίες</string>
